description: This file implements functions for managing variables within a 'Slap Sco Gallery Object' in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). The functions include retrieving, setting, adding, deleting, and deleting all variables associated with the object. It interacts with an atom table and manages memory allocation for vector objects representing variables.

methods.name: SLAP_VARIABLE * SlapScoGalGetVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Retrieves a variable by name from the gallery object, cloning it before returning.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoGalSetVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Sets or updates a variable in the gallery object, adding it if it does not exist, and handles memory and state management.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoGalAddVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Adds a new variable to the gallery object, creating an atom in the atom table and joining it to the gallery.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoGalDelVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Deletes a specific variable from the gallery, removing it from the atom table and freeing associated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoGalDelAllVariables(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deletes all variables from the gallery object, freeing memory and clearing atom table entries.
